Posts.Content: hockeymama2 wrote: I am new to the site. Three weeks ago I found a lump in my left breast. I wentfor a mamo. The mamo was three hours which led to more pictures and a ultrasound from there I met with the radiologist and was told that the lump the I felt was indeed a cyst however they saw some tissue deep in left breast close to chest wall and recommend a steroestatic biopsy. Had biopsy this past Thursday. Took a lot of pictures after and then I met with the radiologist again. I was told that he was confident that he got enough tissue laterally however the area which is five to six centimeters is very close to the chest wall and he was notÂ able with the mamotomme needle to go as far back to the area. So we wait for the pathologist to read to determine if enough tissue was taken and if not then I will need to see a surgeon to have surgery to remove the abnormal tissue. I am scared. Wondering if any if you have had a similar experience and would be kind enough to share your experience with me. They told me that I had a 15-20% chance of this being cancer. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: scared hockeymama2 hockeymama2

Posts.Content: May 29, 2013 11:51AM - edited May 29, 2013 12:43PM by hockeymama2 Thank you. I was supposed to get my results today. When in called they told me they were not back yet and hopefully they will have then tomorrow when I go in for my follow up from my surgery last Monday. I had a d&c laproscopy hysterectomy and a ablation. Praying for good news but very scared.... They said IT was star shaped and deep into my chest wall approx 5-6 centi . nothing to put a name too and its driving me crazy.
Posts.Title: scared hockeymama2 hockeymama2

Posts.Content: May 28, 2013 01:45PM - edited May 28, 2013 01:46PM by hockeymama2 Thank you. God bless you. I get Mt results tomorrow. Terrified because of the size and location. The lump I felt was a cyst and they saw the abnormal tissue deep into the chest wall behind the cyst :-( trying to stay positive and praying it is benign.....just do not know what else it could be.......
